Description: Green serpentine heart-scarab; striated elytra; eleven rows of Hieroglyphic text on base including name of Wahibramerneith.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): fig.44
Exhibition history: 2012 23 March - 23 July 2012, Musee Jaquemart Andre, Paris, Le Crepuscule des Pharaons
